verbs.description: [V: UPDATED] [ARGM-MNR: with Joe Biden statement] : Meghan McCain this morning marveled that White House aide Kelly Sadler still had a job after cracking in the office on Thursday that Sen. John McCain ’s opposition to President Donald Trump ’s CIA director pick did not matter because “ he ’s dying anyway . ” “ Kelly , news flash , We ’re all dying … It ’s not how you die , it ’s how you live , ” said the senator ’s daughter , who is a panelist on the ABC daytime talk ...
